original_text: And you shall eat fat till you are filled, and drink blood till you are drunk, at the sacrificial feast that I am preparing for you.
korean_text: 내가 너희를 위하여 예비한 잔치의 기름을 너희가 배불리 먹으며 그 피를 취하도록 마시되

sentences.original_text: And you shall eat fat till you are filled
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 배부를 때까지 기름을 먹을 것이요

sentences.original_text: and drink blood till you are drunk
that I am preparing for you
